desc: A Whole World Of Good partners with missions networks around the world to help missionaries establish amazing micro-businesses for women and young girls rescued from sex trafficking and also for families living in extreme poverty. We feature their hand-created apparel, blankets, home furnishings, jewelry....

layout.text: INDIA - NEPAL - THAILAND - MEXICO - CAMBODIA - JORDAN - INDONESIA
PAPUA NEW GUINEA - GUATEMALA - COSTA RICO - KRYRGYZSTAN - U.S.A
